titleStmt.title: The French King's declaration to prevent the assemblies of the nevv converts, in the provinces of his kingdom.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)
Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Paris: and reprinted at London, for Richard Baldwin near the Black Bull in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at Versailles the twelfth of March, 1689.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: the Black Bull in the Old-Bailey
